mapper.select:
SELECT A.*,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT R JOIN REGISTER REG USING(REG_NO) WHERE REG.MEMBER_NO = A.REPORT_TARGET_NO AND REPORT_ST = 2) "REPORT_COUNT"
FROM
(SELECT REG_NM "REPORT_TARGET", REPORT_CONTENT, MEMBER_NM "REPORT_NM", REG_NO, REPORT_REQ_DT, REPORT_NO, REGISTER.MEMBER_NO "REPORT_TARGET_NO" FROM REPORT JOIN REGISTER USING(REG_NO) JOIN EPISODE USING(EP_NO) JOIN CLASS C USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TEACHER T ON(T.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = T.MEMBER_NO) WHERE REPORT_DIV = 1 AND REPORT_ST = 0) A
mapper.update: UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_ST = #{reportStatus} WHERE REPORT_NO = #{reportNo}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_ST = 2 WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{reportTargetNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CAL_NO, CAL_REQ_NO, MEMBER_NM TEACHER_NM, CLASS_NM, EP_COUNT, CAL_ST FROM CALCULATE JOIN EPISODE USING(EP_NO) JOIN CLASS USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TEACHER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE CAL_ST != 1
mapper.update: UPDATE CALCULATE SET CAL_ST = 2 WHERE CAL_NO = #{calNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT REG_NM "STUDENT_NM", CASE WHEN REFUND_MONEY IS NULL THEN EP_PRICE ELSE REFUND_MONEY END "CAL_PRICE", CAL_NO
FROM CALCULATE JOIN EPISODE USING(EP_NO) JOIN REGISTER USING(EP_NO) LEFT JOIN REFUND USING(REG_NO) WHERE PAY_ST = 0 AND (REFUND_DT IS NULL OR REFUND_DT = 1) AND CAL_NO = #{calNo}
mapper.insert:
